build_algorithm()[source]¶

Build algorithms using prebuilt networks.

build_network()[source]¶

Build tensorflow operations for algorithms.

get_action(obs)[source]¶

Get action with respect to the observation. :param obs: observation, with 1-dimension representing real-value feature, 3-dimension representing image.

Parameters:
  • minibatch – a minibatch of (state_batch, action_batch, reward_batch, done_batch, next_state_batch)
  • update_ratio – the ratio of update
